textBox.richText: Last winter was not a very good winter to go snowboarding on the east coast. There were hot spots during the winter that made for horrid conditions, and the season didn’t really start till like late January. But this season will be different. This season, will be magnificent. I bought a new board, and I'm ready to take day trips every weekend. And with the Farmer’s Almanac stating that it will be a cold and snowy east coast, I’M ONE HAPPY RABBIT!
